fields.name: プロフェッショナル
fields.prompt: Transform this image into a professional, high-quality photograph suitable for business use. Enhance lighting, adjust colors for a polished look, and ensure the composition is clean and professional.
fields.description: ビジネス用途に適したプロフェッショナルな写真に変換します

fields.name: ナチュラル
fields.prompt: Convert this image to a natural, soft-toned photograph with warm lighting. Emphasize natural beauty and create a relaxed, friendly atmosphere.
fields.description: 自然で柔らかい雰囲気の写真に変換します

fields.name: スタジオ風
fields.prompt: Transform this into a studio-quality photograph with professional lighting setup. Create clean, crisp images with perfect exposure and sharp details, similar to professional studio photography.
fields.description: スタジオで撮影したような高品質な写真に変換します

fields.name: 明るく
fields.prompt: Brighten this image significantly while maintaining natural skin tones. Enhance overall luminosity and create an airy, light-filled atmosphere.
fields.description: 画像全体を明るく、爽やかな印象に変換します

fields.name: 美肌効果
fields.prompt: Enhance skin texture and appearance in this image. Smooth skin while preserving natural details, remove blemishes, and create a flawless yet natural look.
fields.description: 肌を滑らかで美しく見せる効果を追加します

fields.name: 白背景
fields.prompt: Replace the background of this image with a clean, pure white background. Maintain the subject's details and edges while creating a professional white backdrop.
fields.description: 背景を純白に置き換えます

fields.name: ぼかし背景
fields.prompt: Apply a beautiful bokeh effect to the background of this image. Blur the background while keeping the subject sharp and in focus, creating professional depth of field.
fields.description: 背景をぼかして被写体を際立たせます

fields.name: 暖色系
fields.prompt: Adjust the color temperature of this image to warm tones. Add golden, warm hues that create a cozy, inviting atmosphere.
fields.description: 暖かみのある色合いに調整します

fields.name: 寒色系
fields.prompt: Adjust the color temperature of this image to cool tones. Add blue, cool hues that create a fresh, modern atmosphere.
fields.description: 爽やかな寒色系の色合いに調整します

fields.name: ヴィンテージ
fields.prompt: Transform this image into a vintage-style photograph. Add retro color grading, subtle grain, and nostalgic atmosphere reminiscent of classic photography.
fields.description: レトロでヴィンテージな雰囲気に変換します

fields.name: モノクロ
fields.prompt: Convert this image to elegant black and white. Create rich tonal range with deep blacks and bright whites, emphasizing contrast and texture.
fields.description: 印象的なモノクロ写真に変換します

fields.name: ハイコントラスト
fields.prompt: Enhance the contrast of this image dramatically. Create bold, striking visuals with deep shadows and bright highlights for maximum impact.
fields.description: コントラストを強調してインパクトのある写真にします

fields.name: ソフトフォーカス
fields.prompt: Apply a soft focus effect to this image. Create a dreamy, ethereal atmosphere with gentle blur while maintaining subject recognition.
fields.description: 柔らかでドリーミーな雰囲気に変換します

fields.name: 鮮やかに
fields.prompt: Enhance color saturation and vibrancy in this image. Make colors pop while maintaining natural appearance and avoiding oversaturation.
fields.description: 色彩を鮮やかで生き生きとした印象にします

fields.name: フィルム風
fields.prompt: Transform this digital image to look like it was shot on classic film. Add subtle grain, authentic film colors, and characteristic tonal curves of analog photography.
fields.description: フィルムカメラで撮影したような質感に変換します
